data.text: @SteveTVShow @JasonRitter @Lesdoggg Can't wait to see her next week. And what a great interview, wish I could have seen the whole thing... @JasonRitter made a great Kurt Cobain 😉 I love Nirvana too!

@SteveTVShow @JasonRitter @Lesdoggg I am sooooo excited to see @Lesdoggg on next week's episode of @KevinProbably! So awesome! ❤️❤️ Now all we need is a sign from @ABCNetwork that there will be another season of #KevinProbably! 🦋❤️🦋 Please don't make us wait any longer @vickiabc123! 🦋❤️
@SteveTVShow @JasonRitter @Lesdoggg As a big fan of Jason's dad John, I was hoping his granddad Tex Ritter would be mentioned.  When I was a kid he was my favorite country singer!
